thread.title: Claudia Cuba
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Claudia Cuba

author: Claudia Cuba
title: Claudia Cuba
text: I was very happy with Avas as I chose a sympathy floral arrangement to send to a family who has been our neighbor for 60 years...six decades, so I had to find flowers which were special enough. With Avas, I was able to actually see each arrangement they offered. I was able to choose one I really felt good about sending. I also appreciated the follow up....they let me know the exact time the arrangement was delivered. That was important to me.
